properties.description: process log files from the VM, with the self hosted Integration runtime running

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select d.SalesOrderID ,h.OrderDate,h.CustomerID , h.SubTotal,h.TaxAmt,h.Freight,h.TotalDue,
d.OrderQty,d.ProductID,d.UnitPrice,d.UnitPriceDiscount,d.LineTotal
from SalesLT.SalesOrderDetail d
join 
SalesLT.SalesOrderHeader h
on
h.SalesOrderID = d.SalesOrderID
